description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office serving the Vaishali district, with its administrative headquarters located in Hajipur. This RTO is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations across the district. Strategically located near the state capital Patna, it manages significant commercial and passenger traffic crossing the Mahatma Gandhi Setu into North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Yadav Colony Road, Vishunpur Paltu, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
